title: Dataset - On-Chain Analytics
description: DBSync is the best source of raw on-chain data, but it is highly normalized and hard to analyze or apply machine learning in its raw state.
solution: Our plan is to build an open-source analytics-ready dataset of Cardano on-chain data
experience: Founders of Cardano Canucks and Canuckz NFT with 30+ yrs experience in data infrastructure, analysis and data visualization for enterprises.
